title: Spain moves to ban social media for under 16s
summary_full: Online risks like "addiction, abuse, pornography, manipulation, violence... cannot be accepted", said Spain's Prime Minister Pedro Sánchez on Tuesday
summary_public: Online risks like "addiction, abuse, pornography, manipulation, violence... cannot be accepted", said Spain's Prime Minister Pedro Sánchez on Tuesday
